attributes.action: Get rid of the rediculous 2012 Olympics logo and use the one shown on South Today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
